result.execSummary:
The defendant Roy Patricio Campos was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Cocaine/Coca, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(c).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Pay all applicable costs and surcharges and supervision fees by 02-09-2017 or civil judgment will be entered WITHOUT tax intercept.
Defendant shall provide a DNA sample for the Data Bank and pay all appropriate costs, UNLESS PREVIOUSLY COMPLETED.
With credit for 19 days.  TIME SERVED DISPOSITION.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Roy Patricio Campos

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: CLARIFYING Sentencing hearing of 02-08-2016:  Defendant to pay all costs, fees and surcharges by 02-09-2017 or Civil Judgment WITHOUT Tax Intercept.  sdg

Defendant Roy Patricio Campos in court with Student Intern Francesco Balistrieri under attorney Rosemary Cuevas.  David T. Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

Statements made as to sentencing by State, Defense and Defendant.

Defendant sentenced to serve NINETEEN (19) DAYS in the House of Correction with credit for NINETEEN (19) days time served.  TIME SERVED DISPOSITION.

* Defendant to pay all applicable costs and surcharges, and supervision fees or CIVIL JUDGMENT will be entered WITHOUT tax intercept.

Defendant shall provide a DNA sample for the Data Bank and pay all appropriate costs.  UNLESS PREVIOUSLY COMPLETED.

Filed,
Notice of Right to Seek Post-conviction Relief;
Pre-trial Incarceration Credit.

Defendant Roy Patricio Campos in court with Student Intern Francesco Balistrieri under attorney Rosemary Cuevas.  David T. Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

Defense advised that Defendant HAS been assessed and found that Defendant was NOT a candidate for residential.  Court held colloquy with the Defendant.  Court went OFF the Record to hold staffing in Chambers.  Hearing continued on the Record.  Defendant would like to REVOKE himself from the agreement.  On motion of the Defendant,  Court REVOKED the Deferred Prosecution Agreement; proceedings reinstated.  Court orders entry of judgment of conviction.

Attorney Rosemary Cuevas in court, defendant Roy Patricio Campos not in court, in custody.  Brad Alan Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

Defense advised that Defendant was found INELIGIBLE for residential.  State advised that Defendant MAY be under-reporting usage to 'Wiser Choice'.  State requested matter be staffed.  Defense does not object.  Matter to be staffed 02-03-2016.  Defendant to be produced at the next date.  Court ordered matter adjourned to Br. 33 for Review.  Review hearing scheduled for February 8, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
JusticePoint DPA Progress Report.  Filed, sdg.
Turnover to JusticePoint for Placement.  Upon Placement,  Bail to revert to $250.00 PR Bond.

Defendant Roy Patricio Campos in court with attorney Rosemary Reyes Cuevas.  Brad Alan Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

Hearing proceeded on the Record.  Court held colloquy with the Defendant.  Defense advised the Court that his UA may not be negative.  Defendant is on the waiting list for Residential at Dewey.  Court ordered matter adjourned to Br. 33 for Status.
WARRANT NOT GIVEN TO SHERIFF'S - COMMITMENT CANCELLED.  Status conference scheduled for February 1, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Attorney Rosemary Reyes Cuevas in court.  Brad Alan Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued.  NO BAIL IS FORFEITED.
JusticePoint DPA Progress Report.  Filed, sdg.

Defendant Roy Patricio Campos in court with attorney Debra J Patterson for Rosemary Reyes Cuevas.  Brad Alan Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

Matter in Court to address JusticePoint Violation.  Court holds colloquy with Defendant.  Court admonishes Defendant.  Review hearing remains calendared for 01-25-2016 at 08:30am.
JusticePoint DPA Non-compliance Report.  Filed, sdg.
Turnover to JusticePoint for Placement.  Upon Placement Bond to revert back to $200.00 PR Bond.  sdg

Defendant Roy Patricio Campos in court with attorney Rosemary Reyes Cuevas.  Defendant in Custody.  Brad Alan Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

COURT VACATES THE 03-21-2016 HEARING DATE.

Defense advises that Defendant WOULD like the assistance of JusticePoint in order to complete the DPA.  State is willing to continue the DPA.  Court ordered matter adjourned to Br. 33 for Review.  Review hearing scheduled for January 25, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Roy Patricio Campos in court with attorney Debra J Patterson for Rosemary Reyes Cuevas.  David T. Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

Matter in Court to address JusticePoint Violation.  Hearing proceeded on the Record.  SANCTION:  COURT REMANDS DEFENDANT INTO CUSTODY UNTIL 12-14-2015.  Court ordered matter adjourned to Br. 33 for Review.  Review hearing scheduled for December 14, 2015 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint DPA Non-compliance Report.  Filed, sdg.

Defendant Roy Patricio Campos in court with attorney Rosemary Reyes Cuevas.  David T. Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

Based upon the defendant's compliance with Deferred Prosecution Agreement, matter is adjourned for final review hearing in Branch 33.  Review hearing scheduled for March 21, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
JusticePoint DPA Progress Report.  Filed, sdg.

Parties are prepared to enter into a deferred prosecution agreement.
Defendant was advised of constitution rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights and entered a plea of GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights, Addendum  and Elements/Jury Instructions, received and filed.  Stipulation by parties to complaint as a factual basis to sustain the guilty plea.  Defendant further advised that if he is not a US citizen deportation is possible.  Court found the defendant guilty as charged in the Information.  Court WITHHELD entry of judgment of conviction.  Deferred Prosecution Agreement received, signed and filed.  Court ordered case adjourned for review hearing in Branch 33.

Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription, no drug paraphernalia, no dangerous weapons or firearms or not make application for a concealed carry (CCW) permit.

Defendant Roy Patricio Campos in court with attorney Rosemary Reyes Cuevas.  Steven H Glamm appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: TC.   

Defendant advised that this case is assigned to Judge Ashley, Branch 33.
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.   Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Defendant IS Public Defender eligible.  Review hearing scheduled for November 9, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Court appearance in Room 615 Courthouse on 09-18-15 at 01:30pm.
